articles.author: Maggie Baska
articles.title: Twitter safety chief resigns after anti-trans film row - PinkNews
articles.description: Twitter's head of trust and safety under Elon Musk has resigned amid backlash over the social media site's moderation of an anti-trans film.
articles.content:
Twitter’s second head of trust and safety under Elon Musk has resigned amid a controversy over the social media platform’s moderation of an anti-trans film.
Ella Irwin took over as head of trust and… [+2930 chars]
